events.message: The claimant reported a collision involving their vehicle on the highway during rush hour. Details of the accident and initial damage description were provided.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident based on keywords indicating a car collision and vehicle damage.
An agent with experience in auto claims was assigned to this case to ensure smooth handling and swift service to the customer.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the claimant that the investigation will begin promptly.
Requested the claimant to submit police reports, photos of the vehicle damage, and a repair estimate from an authorized service center.
The claimant provided all requested documents including detailed accident report, pictures, and repair bills for the damaged vehicle.
The claims investigation team began assessing the submitted evidence to verify details and liability related to the vehicle collision.
The investigation confirmed details of the accident and validated the extent of the vehicle damage claims as reported.
A fair settlement amount has been proposed to cover repair costs and associated expenses, aiming for customer satisfaction.
The claimant conveyed appreciation for the timely response and adequate settlement proposal offered by the insurance company.
The claim was officially approved following the acceptance of the settlement terms by the claimant without objections.
Payment covering the approved settlement amount was processed and sent to the claimantâ€™s designated account successfully.
Following payment issuance, the claimant's auto accident claim was officially closed with no outstanding issues.
The file was archived in the company records to maintain documentation for future reference and compliance.
